price: Sai ya ce: "Lalle nĩ, na fĩfĩta son dũkiya daga tunãwar Ubangijina, har (rãnã) ta faku da shãmaki!"
arabic: فَقَالَ إِنِّيٓ أَحۡبَبۡتُ حُبَّ ٱلۡخَيۡرِ عَن ذِكۡرِ رَبِّي حَتَّىٰ تَوَارَتۡ بِٱلۡحِجَابِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: faqāla innī aḥbabtu ḥubba al-khayri ʿan dhik'ri rabbī ḥattā tawārat bil-ḥijābi
